submission.individual-reflection: During this exercize I became familliar with XQuery expressions and found the better way to operate and form XML data. After working in the group I didn't find anything really new, only other approaches to XQuery scrips. Overall my solution was fine. I hope my feedback helps my teammates, but their solution was alright too. I didn't improve my solution because it was fine. XQuery topic is quite interesting as it finally offers a way to manipulate XML data that is more readable and potent than XPath. I don't have any suggestions, everything was fine.
